cause.description:
Rail based mass transit has many advantages over bus based transit.
-Rail transit usually operates over separate right of ways, and is not usually affected by traffic jams.
-Train wheels on iron rails have a friction force equal to ice skating.
-Rail transit can carry many more people per unit than a bus can, at significantly less pollution.
-During peak times, trains can be expanded to hold more people, and during light times, trains can be cut down to use less fuel.
-Many rail transit systems use electric engines powered by overhead wires or third rail, this energy may be generated cleanly.
-Train accidents are rare.
Did you know it takes about 40 buses to transport the passengers of one Maryland MARC train?
1. Support Rail based projects in the West
2. Support Amtrak
3. Support Baltimore's Red Line as a ligh rail system.
4. Expand MARC service
cause.name: Support Rail based Mass Transit
